author: Cat Ellis
title: WhatsApp Gold scam promises extra chat features, but installs malware
description: Usage of WhatsApp is booming during the pandemic, and several hoaxes are circulating.
content: A scam promoting WhatsApp Gold a premium version of the messaging service allegedly used by celebrities is circulating on social networks. Would-be users are promised a raft of extra features and given a link, which actually leads to a malicious software down… [+1679 chars]
